description:
Panda is jealous of the Penguin Action Hero Show and asks his friends how get his popularity back.  Masaki taste the bitter truth of why you have to learn all the steps to roasting coffee.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panda Corner Contest! / Coffee Roaster Masaki
Panda Corner no Contest / Abuishi Masaki / Panda Corner no Kikaku
パンダコーナーのコンテスト / 焙煎士マサキ / パンダコーナーの企画
